participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Motivated and energetic, Emily has a passion for fitness and a positive outlook on life. She loves encouraging others to achieve their health goals.
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, Jake is passionate about music and enjoys sharing his love for it with others. He has a strong connection to nature.
participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks.
